meanings.definition: The act of measuring or calculating in meters.
meanings.sent1: The meterages of the room helped us determine how much carpet we needed.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker recorded the meterages of the land for the building project.
meanings.sent3: I tried to impress my friends by guessing the meterages of various objects around us.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in meterages was like having a superpower when it came to DIY projects.
meanings.sent5: The precision of his meterages was so accurate that it amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: The total length or distance measured in meters.
meanings.sent1: The meterages of the race track were crucial for setting new records.
meanings.sent2: The engineer calculated the meterages of the bridge to ensure it met safety standards.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity led it to explore the meterages of the backyard fence.
meanings.sent4: The meterages of the marathon route stretched out like a ribbon of determination.
meanings.sent5: The vast meterages of the ocean made her feel small yet connected to the world.
